content.detailedDescription: I went out for a smoke in the backyard of my home in east vancouver.  i happened to look up towards the ssw and noticed a light in the sky.  it was a blue/bluish white with some less pronounced red.  the light was blinking very rapidly (think strobe light) and would frequently go dark/vanish.  it's movements were very peculiar, as it was moving at a steady pace but would frequently and fluidly change direction very quickly/easily.  i could not imagine anything from my experience that could look and move in the manner this object did.  i stood there fascinated and observed the object for approximately two minutes as it moved closer then away and left and right repeatedly throughout the event.  eventually, it went beyond the tree line, and i was still able to see the lights flashing intermittently through the trees.  then it was completely out of sight.
content.summary: Rapidly blinking red and blue light, would go dark intermittently.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving southbound on arizona highway 387 (north pinal avenue) in casa grande when we observed a amber cigar shaped light to the southwest of us at 45 degree's above the horizon. it was 21:30 on a clear evening. the light was very bright and there was a smaller white light next to it. it was there for just a few seconds and then immediately disappeared. use to seeing many aircraft in the area as they approach phoenix sky harbor but the size, shape and color were unlike any other aircraft we have ever seen in the area before.
content.summary: Cigar shaped amber light sw of casa grande, az

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 23:30 hours, while taking my dogs out in the front yard, i observed a red glowing sphere traveling from the east sky towards the west and suddenly making a 70 degree angle and changing course towards south west sky. the object left a sonic boom that scared my dogs to the point i had to get them inside the house. while the object traveled towards the southwestern sky i noticed a jet liner travelling from north to south. i could distinguished the approximation of the red object altitude. jet liner wad about 32000 feet, the object was approximately 500 to 1000 feet above ground. the duration of the sighting was about 15 to 20 seconds.
content.summary: At approximately 23:30 hours observed a red color orb coming from the east at a very high speed and then turned abruptly towardd tge south west leaving sonic boom behind.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my patio and looked up to see what the weather was doing. the direction i looked was north east. i noticed what first appeared to be a plane but thought that this was the a completely different flight path than i had ever seen before. i watched the light for a few more seconds and realized that the light had not changed position which could only mean that it was stationary, or hovering. i began to watch the object over the next few minutes at which time it began to change directions really abruptly, both vertically and horizontally while still staying within the viewing angle created by trees in the neighboring yards. i have lived in belton for almost 30 years all together including the period of time when the now closed air force base was operational. i am very accustomed to seeing planes fly at night, including air force fighters, and have never seen any plane that could maneuver in such a manner. while viewing the object i noticed the neighborhood dogs began barking and witnessed one dog start running all over the neighbor's yard as if it were chasing something.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green ball of light with a red light in the center.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside with my uncle and we were looking at stars. could not see much because of clouds, then we noticed 3 shapes gliding throught the air. they were shaped like a boomer rang. and a slight green glow. and right before this happened we saw lights that were shaking then they exploded. then we see these shapes just fly by, and i looked back up through a part of the sky that was not covered and we were looking at what looked like a satelite. it was slowly moving across the sky after 4 seconds it got really bright and then dissapeared. i have always been looked at by the aliens, they have always visited me.
content.summary: 3 ufos where under the clouds in salida colorado, they slowly just passed over the town.

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving from montague nj to middletown ny, i was on rt. 84 headed east. i saw something that looked like a plane. it was directly under the cloud coverage. it was as large as a plane and appeared to have wings or be in a boomerang shape. there were flashing lights on the bottom of the object. green, red, and blue i beleive. i remember thinking why the plane appeared to be hoovering instead of moving. i kept my eye on it as i was driving on the highway. never would i have thought of it to be other than a plane. especially since i have seen a ufo about 4 or 5 months ago. why would i ever get the chance to witness something twice in a life time? i did not expect what happened next. as i watched this "plane", a beam of light poured out of it facing up from the roof of the object. this beam of light looked like a shower head. how water streams out, that is how the light was coming out of the roof of the object, pointing into the cloud coverage. two seconds after, the object follows the light. goes straight up into the cloud coverage with no difficulty with movement. as it was cloudy and raining off and on all day, the object was gone. i could not see it or the lights anymore. i was instantly scared. i was in disbeleif as my first experience was differ and i felt no fear. i may have felt fear as i thought i was looking at a plane. i was completly wrong.
content.summary: While driving i saw a plane looking object. object was hoovering as i drove towards middletown ny. beams of white light shined straight up into the clouds. the object went up into the cloud and disappeared.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
These are nightly events that we had started to notice around mid april, and are still continuing. wayne county is very dark at night so these craft are fairly easy to watch as they approach, hover, or move around. 
just after dusk the red/orange tri-angle shaped craft begin to move in usually they will not go south of the little dipper, although have on a few occasions. as night falls, we sometimes have as many as 40, last night, 4/28 we had many more plus quite a light show,even though we were partially overcast with clouds. we observe them from our lawn or driveway, have filmed them, and have 35mm and digital picture stills as well.
tonight i have been outside to look and the skies are pretty overcast but the bright red lights and sparkles are showing through the clouds a bit. the clouds are a bright orangeish color not normal for us.
when i/we, first noticed these lights i assumed the a.N.G. were testing drones in the area as i looked closer i wondered why the constellations had changed? i also wondered why nearly all of the stars were the wrong color like a formation of marslike triangles, during and after lowflying jets and choppers were coming in and out from south to north then east, west and back to south. the jets are quite quiet for as low as they are flying over. army dual rotors are easy to hear and to identify so we knew what the choppers were. we have seen an octagon or hexagon shaped very low flying ship probably 1/2 the size of our town come over very slowly, we have seen color bursts that seem to be red green and yellow with white, or red, violet, blue, green and white, these seem to be ovals that turn into hollow triangle shapes then spin flash and "dance around the sky" disappear but come back. they do answer if engaged as well. the larger triangle shaped red orange ships seem to maintain a hovering in the same spot, the smaller ones seem to have a formation. the larger also sometimes have smaller round white "shooters" come from the brightest part and go to a smaller ship.
i have not been actually physically harmed that i am aware of but we have noticed a sunburn of uncovered areas such as face etc. my husband does seem a bit disoriented after watching the sky. 
losing sight of the objects sometimes happens if they just burn out for lack of a better description or if they begin to get smaller and larger while spinning and changing color and shape. on one of our recordings one of the larger ones comes toward us several times and almost looks like a face. it looks like the large face found on mars.
i am going out now for another look. 4/28/2014.
thank you for your time. will send media if interested.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: As night falls red, orange triangular craft since 4/12, also craft which rotate color

content.detailedDescription: We went to the overlook at muir beach and were stargazing; my lady asked if we were looking at orion because a star-cluster had the appearance of the belt on the constellation... when suddenly one of the 3 stars flew right and went dark, flashing back into view every 5-10 seconds all the way until it went out of sight to the north. along the way it appeared to curve downwards and to change speed and location several times. it was kind of beautiful :-)
content.summary: My girl asked if we were lookin at orion when suddenly one of 3 "stars" flew north dissappearing/flashing and moving erratically.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 8:50 pm - i was called by my 10 year old son ,asking what was that? actually i went to the balcony and saw the ufo - it was yellow orange pulsating going from west toast ascending slowly and than going south .- actually it was too far to describe the shape because of the distance and because of the blur caused by the pulsating lights.

 by this time everyone saw the object - my wife - my kids and i - we were amazed as it ascended to disappear quickly with no noise .
content.summary: Yellow orange pulsating - flashing - hovering smoothly than changed direction - suddenly went fast and disappearing by apparently going up

content.detailedDescription: I was about 16 yrs old, just finishing up playing softball for a neighborhood team.My mom came and picked me up and we live about 3 iles from the park where i was at.As my mom is driving, i look up into the sky and see so many stars which was weird because with the city lights, you dont see many stars.So i took a second look and all of a sudden, the lights(stars) took off like light speed to the horizon, then shot straight into the air.It wasnt shooting stars because these lights were in unison..Needless to say, i didnt tell my mom because she wouldnt have believed me..I didnt tell anyone till about 3 yrs later, i confided in my older sister...Never spoke about it again and i didnt know who to contact back then.I remember as if it happened yesterday.
content.summary: It appeared to be like if there were too many stars in the night sky that didnt belong.

content.detailedDescription:
On 4/2/14 observed 4 white lights in the nw sky.  three were in a v formation the 4th was next to the 3rd.  the first light seemed larger and brighter.  two and 3 about the same size and 4 was smaller size. they eventually slowly went into a straight formation and then that seemed to be the time when 2 3 and 4 started to blink red and green.  eventually they slowly moved (no sound) in a straight line up and down.  then went  back to the straight line across continued blinking.  then while viewing the lights i saw one or two very fast moving dark jets no sound moving toward the lights.  at 7 15 am we stopped watching and the lights were almost gone and the sun came up and no more sighting.  called a couple of newspapers and was transferred and never received a call back.  went to a local newspaper and they were too busy and never called us back also.
we were just rising and happened to look out the window toward manhatten.
we first noticed the light because it was so bright.
when we first noticed the light it seemed very suspicious.
the lights were round and not moving with no sound and in a v and then in straight lines across and up and down
we were excited that we may be looking at something from another world
the lights disappeared when the sun rose
content.summary: Observed 3 bright lights shaped in a v and the fourth was next to the 3rd then went into a straight line with 2 3 and 4 pulsating green and red

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a photo of the chik-fil-a billboard at the intersection of interstate highway 10 and dezavala road in san antonio and didn't realize until after i got home that i had photographed a ufo. (two ufos, actually.)

i took a total of 10 photos starting at 4:56:12 pm. the ufo doesn't appear until 4:57:57 pm, and was gone by 4:58:05 pm. i have a total of three photos that show one or both ufos.  

the photos show two ufos, one above the billboard and one in the bottom right quadrant, behind a tree. 

the second photo shows a ufo in the upper center and "cookie cutter" type hole the cloud, in the same size and shape of the ufo, and a second ufo now emerged from behind a tree in the bottom right quadrant of the photo. 

this was not something on my windshield or camera.  if you enlarge the photos, in one image, you can see the overhead powerline in front of the ufo and the tree in front of the second ufo.

again, i didn't know i had photographed anything until hours later. 

if you look at the photos closely, there are also some smaller, lighter grey dots that are hovering in an arc--possibly circular formation--around the ufo in the top center of the first two photos. 

i am willing to share additional photos, if you need them, taken before and after the photos that show the ufos.  i am also willing to discuss the circumstances under which i took the photos and answer any questions that mufon might have.
content.summary: I photographed two ufos (and possibly others), one of which punched a hole in a cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was a milk truck driver running the olathe school delivers and after leaving olathe north high school, i see three lights in the sky and as i watched the lights the front light of the triangular object got brighter like a spot light so i thought it was a helicopter or something like that but it seemed to know i was looking at it and as i headed to my next school just a few blocks from my last stop it shot across the sky and disappeared in the tree line, when i first saw it i didn't think anything of it but when it flew over my location at the speed it did i knew it wasn't something man-made
content.summary: Three lights in the sky while on my route caught my eye

content.detailedDescription: Was taking out the trash when the object caught my eye. the blanking out of the stars that caught me. looked up and saw the large disk coming from the east over the carports behind the apartments. watched it approach. when it was directly south of me, i dropped the trash bag and ran into the house to get my folks to come look. by the time dad came out, the disk was far to the west and still moving. he said he couldn't see it. it kept moving west till it was out of sight. dad just looked at me and said to pick up the trash, put it in the bin and come inside.
content.summary: Watched silent disk float by me

content.detailedDescription: This was back in 2008, it was the summer and my friend and i had just come back to my house after seeing a movie, i forget which movie it was. it was late july and we were standing out on my front lawn. there was a heat lightning storm going on in the sky over the north-east. i looked up and saw a craft moving across the horizon from the east to north. it was nothing more than a white orb-light, like a high flying jet. i initially thought nothing of it. but it vanished suddenly just above the treeline. it vanished a bit above the treeline. i thought that was strange and i asked my friend if he saw that. he shrugged his shoulders, he hadn't been looking at the sky. we went back to talking. about five minutes later, the heat lightning storm got bigger. i saw a white orb-light again. it was above the treeline. (the orb was kilometers off in the distance from me.) suddenly it shout straight up in the air, vanished (or teleported?, reappeared next to the lightning storm and started bopping about in sharp angles that no aircraft could make. after bopping around in the night sky for about twenty seconds, it vanished into the storm as the lightning got stronger. i bid my friend good night as we parted ways before the storm approached. afterwards i felt that it was pretty cool to have seen a ufo, as for my actions and feelings during the event, i was rather focused on my conversation with my friend, not that i can remember what that conversation was about.
content.summary: White orb high in the sky near a lightning storm

content.detailedDescription:
we were having fire works having fun then i saw a ufo no sound or any thing.Then later we saw it join up with another one then they suddenly dissapered (10:00p.M.Est.) i was freaked out....

lantern shpaed object.
content.summary: Lantern like ufo

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside in our hot tub. i was noticing a strange star pattern. (not regular formations, as we sit in our tub several times a week).  i observed a large triangle shape craft traveling from se to nw at a steady pace and steady altitude. the craft appeared to have 7 colored lights (as if dimly lit ultra-violet lights).  the lights were steady and not flashing. there was no sound from the craft. i did notice there was no commercial activity 10 minutes prior and at least 10 - 15 minutes after the sighting which is odd because our house is located between 3 major airports and is in the near flight path of the oakland airport.  i stated out loud to my wife, "what the f*@# is that!" while pointing to the sky above the neighbors house.  the object disappeared from sight when the neighbors tree line blocked my view.  please let me know if i can provide any other assistance. or if anyone else may have seen the same.
thanks,
brett
content.summary: V shaped ufo over union city 04-27-14

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: At times hundreds of orbs not a exaggeration   orange orbs in sky ,green basketball sided and blue white baseball sized in home  orange orbs came in waves sometimes making geometric shapes
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Multiple orbs amber colored also a green orb in home as well as a baseball sized blue ball by my head many different dates  different types of  events i record the dates of most would like to speak to someone  i got pics as well  good ones  ready to talk

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:25 am as i stood outside across the street from the triangle of the transamerica tower, looking toward embarcadero and the pacific ocean, i saw it in all of its magnificence--not just a ufo, but an actual spaceship. it looked large, like the size of a moon--shining with an extraterrestrial ring around it, much like planet saturn. however, it was sacral chakra orange, with a glowing orb inside of it which had a metallic hue to it. it was solid in appearance and had a white aura around it which gave the appearance of vibration. it was facing north toward pier 39 and fisherman's wharf.

as much as i've wanted to see one, i still couldn't believe what i was seeing with my physical eyes to be real. i glanced down for a moment, looked back up, and there it was!! it stole my breath away. even after watching it for what felt like ages, i still questioned what i was seeing and experiencing. i turned my head all the way to the right, and this time, when i looked ahead, the ship was gone.

i speak telepathically with extraterrestrials who have shown themselves to me in the physical world. as i saw the ufo, andrew the extraterrstrial confirmed it was indeed a ufo.
content.summary: Ufo was shape like saturn, though ring was wider so that sphere of ufo looked more ship-like than planet-like. it was a light metallic with a glowing center which looked solid, and an orange sacral chakra glow, shadow of metallic ring visible,had depth.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping at the hotel and around four a.M. i woke up and went to the window, opened the curtains to see the moon on the waves.The ocean was calm, very little wave action. all of a sudden i realize there are lights coming from under the water, it's stationary and right at the edge of the wave line. it looked like a disk shape and about 100 ft. wide, 6 light's shooting out through the water. the white of the wave caught the light but it moved on and the object stayed stationary. after about 25 minutes the lights went out all at the same time . saw nothing come out of the water or movement in the water. this all happened 75 feet from my room.
content.summary: Oon. woke up and went to the window, opened curtains aout of the waves.  the object was stationary.  after a while the lights tu

content.detailedDescription: On july 12th 2009 my ex wife's daughter tanya and i watched seven ufos do really strange things between 330am until the sun rose and all but one dissolved into thin air. the police were called as well as the air force base, to no avail.I could better tell this story i'n person.Absolutely unbelievable!!!!! i always knew they were there, but to see the truth is amazing!!
content.summary: 7 objects. three huge spheres( unknown size) gathered around something giving energy. a red cylinder shot from the west to join this activity. then a 4th sphere below initial craft and then forth craft appeared below that!

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to school, walking, west bound on bingham toward silver st. it was a bright, party cloudy, sunny morning. as i crossed silver st turning south to continue on to school, i noticed this round silver disk moving slowly from south to north just above the power lines.  it made no sound, and traveled in a perfectly straight line.  i looked around for other witnesses but saw none.  i watched the object until it was out of sight which took about one to two minutes.  i know this was a long time ago, but, it has been on my mind ever since.  i would have be around eight or nine years of age.  a little too young to believe, however, i did see this object and i have never forgotten it.  

last week, i was watching television about sightings, and realized i have witnessed something.  none of the shows i saw came close to my sighting, and mine was not as spectacular as others, but i did see it.  at that time, i was not aware of ufo's or their meaning.  we did not have a television and there was not much to hear via radio.  

why have i waited so long?  i didn't think anyone would believe me. i have gone to the mufon site before, but never followed through.  i thought it was about time.

the date is approximate.  it could be 1951 or 1952, i don't remember exactly.  i know what i saw, and i was wondering if around that same time if anyone else in the same general vicinity or time frame saw anything.  

houston is a big place as well as harris county, so the intersection of silver and bingham is located at lat. 29.771399, long. -95.377025.

thank you for your time and consideration in this matter.
content.summary: Round disk moving south to north in a straight line

content.detailedDescription:
What i am about to tell you might not be of interest to you as it happened in august of 1990, and they were not ufo���s in general terms.  in fact when i first viewed them i didn���t think anything was unusual, until my brain rejected the obvious, and focused on the absurd.  i must also first explain that i hail from a family of pilots both private and military, so i am no stranger to all sorts of air-crafts.

it was a clear beautiful sunny day in august.  i had just left medford oregon and was heading home to rogue river.  i was traveling on the side road that parallels interstate 5.  i was approaching gold hill where my brother lived.  i was alone with no other cars around me.  it was then that i spotted two jet fighters traveling in wingman formation.  so what, i have lived on and around military bases, and to me they are not that exciting any more.  i did wonder why they were there as i didn���t know of any bases in that location.  i then became confused as to why they were traveling so low, slow and soundless.  my windows were open and the radio off, so i should have at least heard them.  it was then that i got the shock of my life.  they had no wings.  

now most would tell me that i was looking at choppers on whisper mode, but there were no blades of any kind.  the speed they were moving at was so slow that if i had speeded up i might have been able to pass them.  of course i am now traveling at 15 miles an hour as i can���t believe what i am looking at.  i finally reached my brother���s home but alas it was not there, and i was left to watch them finally disappear in the direction of the pacific ocean.  

i tell myself that the military was developing a new toy that appeared to work well but never made it to main stream use.  aside from me having a 60���s day dream, what do you think?  is this a note worthy flying mystery, or just a run of the mill walk in the park for our fly boys?
content.summary: F-15's without wings

content.detailedDescription: Just returning home from work at jfk airport when an unusual light caught my eye gliding at low altitude over great south bay the size n speed puzzled me. the object was heading west but as soon as i used binoculars it began to come towards me. i became slightly nervous and even more curious.Now the light appeared to be a pulsating orb orange yellowish and getting bigger!As my heart rate increased i actually became unnerved and wondered what is it and why is it coming at me.The speed was maybe 45mph? i was dumbfounded"what the hell is this?"i ran outside to my front yard and hovering silently overhead was a black triangle the size of yankee stadium with 3 bright beams of light emitting from each corner coming together as one right at me!Silent! the outer rim of craft had rectangular lights blinking on and off like a wheel within a wheel-ezekiel's craft?Mesmerized and frozen in place i watched with and without binoculars and observed a dark grey/black metallic surface with no noticeable plates or rivets. i believe there were silhouetted figures behind window/porthole structures. childlike/kin?Then after hovering silently the craft ascended slowly at first but then accelerated to supersonic speeds,no sonic boom contrail or sounds at all and headed nw. i believe to have some missing time,felt like 8 mins but watch said over 20. the visions and nightmares have been a constant part of my life since. even moved to california although i feel it was overall a positive experience i'm unable to live my life as i had previously.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw pulsating orb over bay through my window as soon as i watched with binoculars it changed path shortly after an enormous silent black triangle was overhead shining 3 beams of light on me with oscillating lights on perimeter of craft eventually rising

content.detailedDescription:
I was very young- prior to kindergarten.  approx 4 years old.  this was one of several experiences while i was growing up.  we lived in an extremely rural area with no neighbors for miles.  this incident was during the day and did not frighten or traumatize me.  i was playing on my tire swing and the next memory i have is standing (rather than on my swing) looking directly above the tree and being "locked" in eye contact with what i knew was a female through a window.  this window was one of several on a metallic craft.  the sheen of it looked somewhat like stainless steel and was not really reflective.  it made no noise, went from a hover to a very slow glide and then it was gone.  i ran inside and  told my mother that i had seen an airplane that was so low, i could see the people inside the windows.  up to this point in life, my brother and i had only seen airplanes in detail on tv, so when we saw planes in the sky we would try to make out the wings etc.

i also remember the following episodes in different places when i was young:

at the above mentioned home, me, my mom, dad and brother were outside at twilight sitting in lawn chairs discussing the silk worms in the tree we were sitting next to.   i remember noticing a twinkling light coming towards us and when i turned to my parents to show it to them they had been "switched off" (again).  no further memory.

also in the above house i have a memory of waking up to standing outside our house staring up at the sky at colored lights that were going away.  i calmly went back into the house and got into my bed.  kind of odd for a four year old that would not even spend the night at her cousin's house because she had never been outside of arm's reach of her mother.

i received a small "l" shaped scar on my left index finger while someone placed a square shaped "washer" against my skin.  no bleeding or pain.  i have no idea where we were living at the time and no memory of the surroundings during this event.  i haven't heard from him in years, but i believe that my brother has a matching scar on the same finger.

i have a very brief memory of a very tall, blonde man that was accompanied by a female.  i remember it was outside, windy and the entire landscape was sand.  the memory is of him setting me down (on my feet), giving me a "last look" and turning around to walk in the same direction as the female.  in about 15 feet they stepped inside what i can only describe as looking like a sand dune.  sand dune as a description came much later in life.  at the time i was too young to verbally identify anything other than the "people" and the sand.  i believe that they were both dressed in white as i have always referred to him in my mind as "that white man".  i don't know where we were living when this happened, but i think i was toddler age at this time.  for the record, we never lived near the desert or the ocean.  my first time even seeing the ocean was when i was 13.  i have still never been to the desert and i am 44.

when we lived lived in kincaid illinois (again pre-kindergarten) i can remember a toy flying saucer coming into our house and switching everyone "off".  this upset me but before i had time to react, the memory ends and begins again with me frantically trying to tell my mom that she and everyone else fell asleep while standing up.  she tried to reassure me, and promised she didn't go to sleep but this only upset me more because i knew she had and this meant it was something she couldn't "fix".  

there are more, but they are very hard to articulate.
content.summary: I was playing on tire swing/ then next memory is this craft above the tree my tire swing was on as it was leaving.

content.detailedDescription: In roughly the winter of 1998/1999, i was driving out of lake geneva on hwy 50 (if i recall, that is the name of the main road out of town towards kenosha) when i noticed a long ship, that was a straight line with a bright white light on each end and one in the middle. i didn't think much of it at first, although i did continue looking at it because it didn't resemble a plane in shape (a straight line like a cigar or something) and the lights looked different. i began to really pay attention when i turned off hwy 50 onto the side road that lead to my subdivision (i can't recall the county road but it leads to tuscany-the subdivision i was living in at the time). the craft was originally headed parallel to the highway traveling in the direction towards kenosha and away from lake geneva as i was, but when i turned 90 degrees onto the side road, the craft changed direction 90 degrees as well. i took note because aircraft don't turn 90 degrees like that. the aircraft seemed to follow me change in direction, and to be descending to lower altitudes and getting closer. i remember slowing down to basically a crawl in my vehicle to watch the craft, and as crazy as this may sound, the next thing i remember is coming to standing outside my car, behind the rear bumper, driver's side door was open, no recollection of getting out of the car, and now the large ship i had seen before is gone and there is a much smaller triangle sized ship hovering maybe 20 feet at most over the road and maybe 20 feet away horizontally. it was completely silent, a white light on each corner of the triangle and an orange or yellow light (it's been 16 years-hard to remember everything). i freaked out and jumped in my car and took up as fast as i could. looking back in my rear and side view mirrors, the triangle craft was gone, but the large cigar type crafted i had previously viewed (but that was nowhere in sight while i observed the triangle craft) was on back up in the sky and was again traveling parallel to my car. i make another 90 turn into my subdivision of the side road and the craft did so as well. i made another 90 degree turn off the first road in my subdivision onto the second one (the one on which i lived-sienna circle) and again the craft changed direction with me. i ran into side as fast as i could. upon entering the house, i looked out every window i could in each direction and saw neither ship. i proceeded to write down the entire event and (eventually) fell asleep. the next morning my girlfriend stopped by before school as she typically did and as soon as i woke up i excitedly started to tell her of the previous nights event. she told me to calm down and that i had been dreaming-reminding me i just woke up. i told her i wasn't dreaming it-to look on my dresser where i had written it all down. that was that until maybe 6 months later i was in kenosha at a friends house. he was late returning and i began to worry about him and was looking out his back door towards the main road anxiously awaiting his return. that is when i noticed a small triangle craft (exactly like the one i saw before) hovering maybe 20 feet off the ground, not making a sound, and coming slowly-very slowly-towards the house. it flew across the back yard straight towards me and i called the other woman there who was there to come look and she too saw it in amazement. we watched it for a few minutes as it slowly approached the house, flew over it barely over the rooftop and proceeded across the street. upon being direction above the house across the street, it changed direction 90 degrees and slowly hovered over all the houses on the opposite side of the street until it was out of sight. i kept this mostly to myself for the last 16 years because (a) i have no proof and (b) most people don't believe you or don't care. after seeing report after report and pic after pic of similar triangle ships, i figured i'd go ahead report mine too for whatever it's worth. thanks
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large rectangular ufo followed my car, then small triangle ufo hovered near me, then back to large ship.

content.detailedDescription:
On the nice weekend evening me and my husband heading towards the hinjevadi village.When we turned to the village road we were facing the sun. i was trying to snap sunset from running car, i snapped three pictures from my cellphone and they were not coming much clear. but when i saw the pictures at home i found a round shape black object which was not a lamp or an airplane.When i saw one of the snap my first thought was it could be reflection  but when i check other two pictures it is clear that it is not a reflection.I tried to check in negative of the image and that was very clearly round shaped object.
we are amazed and thinking what that object could be.
content.summary: Craft in the sky over india

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to my backyard to take out my dogs when i noticed a bright, red star-like light suspended on the air; not moving. i thouth it might a planet, but there are no planets that big and bright to watch with your naked eye.  

after 2 or three minutes it took a sharp turn to the left (sw) and reappeared high on top of my neighbor's house. i ran inside looking for my iphone, which was not functioning normally. i managed to take three pictures in a row showing the object already movin away--it looked as it was shrinking--until it just disappeared.  

i tried to enlarge my photos as much as i could, and you can see a big "ball of fire" that becomes yellowish inside. the second photo shows the object already a far and yellow. it just disappeared. my photos were e- mailed to your website.
content.summary: A big red star- like object static for awhile and then moved sharply and erratically disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I exited the 101 mall and headed south to my car.  the sky is clear, blue, not a cloud at all.  the sun was just above the mall so i was in the shadow.  at no point did the sun hit my eyes so i know it wasnt just my eyes.  it was about 25 degrees from the horizon and not moving one bit.  i paused and put the telephone poll in the way to see if it was moving.  i first thought it was the moon but then i realised it was too small.  it looked like a shiny finger nail in the sky.  it was west of the sun and reflected the suns light.  i got into my caqr, then decided i was going to look again so i got back out and it blinked out and lef no trail or any type of trace.  i only have a crappy blackberry and couldnt get the camera app out fast enough.  it truely was amazing
content.summary: Reflective disc in daytime
